sent.orig: Xiao long foreskin good as thin as paper, not to mention to mention the broken belt.
sent.trans: 好的小笼包皮薄如纸，提来提去还不带破的。

sent.orig: It is indelicate of you to mention her marriage problem.
sent.trans: 你提到她的婚姻难题，这很失礼。

sent.orig: Not to mention the perfect pal for your drinking needs is a pork and kimchi stir-fry.
sent.trans: 当然用蛋包配上泡菜炒猪肉绝对是下酒菜的新宠儿。

sent.orig: Here I shall also mention the problem of bloating.
sent.trans: 这里我还要讲一个肿字。

sent.orig: I won't even mention meat's moral implications.
sent.trans: 更不要说与吃肉相关的种种道德问题了。
